full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ME LHA MCHOD PA'I DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RENGS DKAR PO BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013B (ZHES ME LHA MCHOD PA'I CHO GA DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RENGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI MCHOD AEm CHI BKA' BCU DANG, ,NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GNYIS GZHAN LA PHAN BSAM GYIS SOG YUL 'DI KAR ME LHA MCHOD CING GA-YANG BLANG BLA BKRA SHIS PA 'BYUNG 'DUG KYANG LHA BSKYED PA MCHOD PA'I BYIN RLABS SOGS PA MED PA'I SOGS YIG TSIG LHAG CHAD CAN GYI LUGS 'JIG @014A *, ,RTEN PA 'GA' SNOD MANG, RANG DE DE LA LHA BSKYED PA'I ME LHA MCHOD ZHIG BYED DGOS 'DONG ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR MCHOG PAR SBYIN SREG GI THAB BSKYED DANG, ,SLOB DPON PADMA MDZAD PA'I GA-YANG KHUG CHEN PO'I BYED KYI TSIG 'GA' ZHIG BSDUS NAS RAB 'BYAMS PA NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS KYI MDZAD PA'I STENG DU NYER SPYAD LNGA DANG SPEL TSIG DANG, LUG GI BRANG DANG MAR KHU DANG CHANG GI 'BUL SOGS KYI BSNUN TE, SKYABS MGON DAM PA DZA YA PAntI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA NOM CHI KOO SHRI CHOS RJE BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN SBYAR BA'O, ,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,)
